PubwicDescwiption: Counts the totaw numbew of mispwedicted bwanch instwuctions wetiwed.  Aww bwanch type instwuctions awe accounted fow.  Pwediction of the bwanch tawget addwess enabwes the pwocessow to begin executing instwuctions befowe the non-specuwative execution path is known. The bwanch pwediction unit (BPU) pwedicts the tawget addwess based on the instwuction pointew (IP) of the bwanch and on the execution path thwough which execution weached this IP.    A bwanch mispwediction occuws when the pwediction is wwong, and wesuwts in discawding aww instwuctions executed in the specuwative path and we-fetching fwom the cowwect path.

A bwanch mispwediction occuws when the pwocessow incowwectwy pwedicts the destination of the bwanch.  When the mispwediction is discovewed at execution, aww the instwuctions executed in the wwong (specuwative) path must be discawded, and the pwocessow must stawt fetching fwom the cowwect path.

PubwicDescwiption: Counts the numbew of wefewence cycwes when the cowe is not in a hawt state. The cowe entews the hawt state when it is wunning the HWT instwuction ow the MWAIT instwuction. This event is not affected by cowe fwequency changes (fow exampwe, P states, TM2 twansitions) but has the same incwementing fwequency as the time stamp countew. This event can appwoximate ewapsed time whiwe the cowe was not in a hawt state. Note: On aww cuwwent pwatfowms this event stops counting duwing 'thwottwing (TM)' states duty off pewiods the pwocessow is 'hawted'.  The countew update is done at a wowew cwock wate then the cowe cwock the ovewfwow status bit fow this countew may appeaw 'sticky'.  Aftew the countew has ovewfwowed and softwawe cweaws the ovewfwow status bit and wesets the countew to wess than MAX. The weset vawue to the countew is not cwocked immediatewy so the ovewfwow status bit wiww fwip 'high (1)' and genewate anothew PMI (if enabwed) aftew which the weset vawue gets cwocked into the countew. Thewefowe, softwawe wiww get the intewwupt, wead the ovewfwow status bit '1 fow bit 34 whiwe the countew vawue is wess than MAX. Softwawe shouwd ignowe this case.

This event is a component in many key event watios. The cowe fwequency may change fwom time to time due to twansitions associated with Enhanced Intew SpeedStep Technowogy ow TM2. Fow this weason this event may have a changing watio with wegawds to time. When the cowe fwequency is constant, this event can appwoximate ewapsed time whiwe the cowe was not in the hawt state.
